Text: CA for EncoreNonPrivilegedpst Gerald Here is the information that you requested Counter party Encore Acquisition Partners Address Main St Ste Fort Worth TX Scope The scope of this project is to analyze develop and propose a compression services package that will optimally manage Encores current and future horsepower requirements In order to do this we will need to explain our financial structures and gain access to information pertaining to their compression facilities and existing power agreements Email me with the completed CA so that I can forward it on to the client Thanks Nathan B Creech
